title: Calories in Naan Bread
meta_description: Discover calories in naan, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per piece, plus variations and FAQs for better meal planning.
assumptions: Plain naan bread (approx. 100 g per piece), tandoor-baked with yogurt and flour, no added butter or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One standard naan provides about 250 kcal, mainly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one naan?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for a standard plain naan.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in naan?
faqs.a: Roughly 45 g carbs per naan, with 2 g fiber.
Yes, around 500 mg sodium per piece due to salt in dough.

faqs.q: Calories in garlic naan vs plain?
faqs.a: Garlic naan adds about 50 kcal from butter, totaling ~300 kcal.
About 8 g protein per naan, from flour and yogurt.
